name: basic_express_api_structure
description: Basic strcuture for REST API with ExpressJS

scripts.start: export NODE_ENV='production'   && pm2 start dist/app.js --name='api_name' -l storage/logs/app/app.log
scripts.deploy: npm run undeploy               && sudo docker-compose up -d && sudo docker-compose exec -d service npm run start-on-docker
scripts.undeploy: sudo docker-compose stop       && sudo docker-compose rm
